Bash("/cygdrive/c/Users/pangruitao/.conda/envs/ghf-server/python.exe" -c "
import duckdb
con = duckdb.connect(''data/ganghaofan.duckdb'')
print(''=== Users table ==='')
result = con.execute(''SELECT * FROM users LIMIT 5'').fetchall()
for row in result:
    print(row)
print(''\n=== Meals table ==='')
result = con.execute(''SELECT * FROM meals LIMIT 5'').fetchall()
for row in result:
    print(row)
print(''\n=== Table constraints ==='')
result = con.execute(''PRAGMA table_info(meals)'').fetchall()
for row in result:
    print(row)
")

Bash("/cygdrive/c/Users/pangruitao/.conda/envs/ghf-server/python.exe" -c "
try:
    from api.v1.meals import router
    print(''Meals router imported successfully'')
    print(f''Router routes: {[route.path for route in router.routes]}'')
    print(f''Router methods: {[route.methods for route in router.routes]}'')
except Exception as e:
    print(f''Import error: {e}'')
    import traceback
    traceback.print_exc()
")

Bash("/cygdrive/c/Users/pangruitao/.conda/envs/ghf-server/python.exe" -c "
import duckdb
con = duckdb.connect(''data/ganghaofan.duckdb'')
# 查看现有用户
print(''=== Current users ==='')
users = con.execute(''SELECT * FROM users'').fetchall()
for user in users:
    print(user)
# 设置mock用户为管理员
con.execute(''UPDATE users SET is_admin = true WHERE open_id = ?'', [''mock_dev_user''])
print(''\n=== Updated users ==='')
users = con.execute(''SELECT * FROM users'').fetchall()
for user in users:
    print(user)
con.close()
")
